Class AppArray

Namespace
ASE_Assignment_Demo.Components
Assembly
ASE Assignment Demo.dll

Represents an application-level array with support for integer and real number types. Provides functionality to compile, execute, and manipulate array values.

public class AppArray : Evaluation, ICommand
